pkgmetadata.longdescription: Divisive Hierarchical Clustering // Contains a single function dclust() for divisive hierarchical clustering based on recursive k-means partitioning (k = 2). Useful for clustering large datasets where computation of a n x n distance matrix is not feasible (e.g. n 10,000 records). For further information see Steinbach, Karypis and Kumar (2000) http://glaros.dtc.umn.e du/gkhome/fetch/papers/docclusterKDDTMW00.pdf.
